summary: King's Ransom Winery is one of the most haunted places in America, with a long history of bizarre suicides. Six ghost hunters have been given the rare opportunity to conduct a paranormal investigation. What they discover terrifies them.
cast: Kristina Anapau|Mark Hapka|David Weidoff|Linsey Godfrey|Brendan Fletcher|Alexis Cruz|Sarah Oh|Olivia Stuck|Richard Sarafian Jr.|Jessica Spotts|Ed Corbin|Brooke Bonelli|Michele Boyd|Ariel Feruglio|Sarah Hass|Tori Kostic|Indie Sarafian|Natalie Denise Sperl|Isabella Turner|Guy Wilson
title: Altergeist
